Copyright 2020 GB Industries Clear All Grow Data Edit Grow Information Start Grow Assistant CannaMaster Help If you are experiencing issues with this app or cannot get a feature to work, contact us using the form below. Be sure to include as much relevant information as possible so we can replicate your problem and provide a solution. I Am Getting An Error I Have A Question I Have A Suggestion Use This Space To Explain Your Issue Or Suggestion Send To Developers Select Your Grow Details *We will never collect personal information about your grow operation. All data is stored locally on your device and accessible only by you Take a few minutes to set some variables about your grow operation. By answering a handful of multiple choice questions our grow Assistant will look over your data and set reminders for important events so you can give your girls all the attention they deserve. Never miss or forget a crucial cultivation event again!. Grow Medium Indoor Soil Outdoor Grow Indoor Hydroponic Fertilizer Chemical Organic How Often Do You Water? Every Day Every Other Day Every Three Days Once A Week Do Not Set Watering Notification Is Your Strain Indica Or Sativa? 100% Indica 100% Sativa 50/50 Indica/Sativa Hybrid 60/40 Indica/Sativa Hybrid 40/60 Indica/Sativa Hybrid 70/30 Indica/Sativa Hybrid 30/70 Indica/Sativa Hybrid Mostly Sativa Mostly Indica Unknown Set Your Notifications Click Here To Set Your Notifications local calendar manager Account Title add Event Title CannaMaster Grow Assistant Copyright 2020 GB Productions Version 2.0.1 Calendar Account Type Calendar Owner Account Haptic Feedback Preference Haptic Feedback Summary All Rights Reserved - What's New - -New Grow Assistant Method - Software Licences - >
